## Notation

$$ \mathbb{B}^{1} $$

## Definition

The *modular binary set 1* noted $ \mathbb{B}^{1} $ is defined as the ordered set of the two numbers 0 and 1, 0 being followed by 1. To designate 0 and 1 we will use the word *bit*.

## Formal Definition

$$ \mathbb{B}^{1} = (0,1) $$
